attributes.action: use his influence to persuade Josh T. Pearson to allow members of the public to live in his ample beard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long the people of this country have lived in buildings. I forsee a day, not far for now when every man, woman and child lives in the beard of their dreams.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
